test.tsx (11,21): Argument of type '"simple-param"' is not assignable to parameter of type 'TranslationKey'.
test.tsx (13,15): Argument of type '{ id: "no-param"; }' is not assignable to parameter of type 'TranslationKey'.
  Property 'params' is missing in type '{ id: "no-param"; }' but required in type '{ id: "simple-param"; params: { a: string; }; }'.
test.tsx (19,3): Type '{ id: "no-param"; }' is not assignable to type 'TranslationKey'.
  Property 'params' is missing in type '{ id: "no-param"; }' but required in type '{ id: "simple-param"; params: { a: string; }; }'.
test.tsx (25,3): Type '"invalid"' is not assignable to type 'TranslationKey'.
